doc:
Barbi Benton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barbi_Benton 0 Barbi Benton (born Barbara Lynn Klein; January 28, 1950) is an American model, actress and singer. She is known for appearing in Playboy magazine, as a four-season regular on the comedy series Hee Haw, and for recording several modestly successful albums in the 1970s. Since the 1980s, she has been semi-retired from show business to raise her children. Barbi_Benton ( born Barbara_Lynn_Klein ; January_28_,_1950 ) is an_American_model_,_actress_and_singer . She is_known for appearing in Playboy_magazine , as a_four-season_regular on the_comedy_series_Hee_Haw , and for recording several modestly_successful_albums in the_1970s . Since the_1980s , she has_been semi-retired from show_business to_raise her_children .
